0.text: What are the expressions used to,
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>What are the expressions used to,</prosody></speak>

1.text: ² apologize ² cheer an athlete

4.text: ² ask someone to wait for his or her turn
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>ask someone to wait for his or her turn</prosody></speak>

6.text: ² ask something from someone ² decline a request
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>ask something from someone, decline a request</prosody></speak>

7.text: ² Please stand in queue and wait for your turn
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Please stand in queue and wait for your turn</prosody></speak>

15.text: Get into groups of five. Your teacher will whisper a secret to the first member of each group. Whisper it to the person next to you. The last member of the group must whisper it to the teacher. The first group which reports correctly will be the winner.
15.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Get into groups of five. Your teacher will whisper a secret to the first member of each group. Whisper it to the person next to you. The last member of the group must whisper it to the teacher. The first group which reports correctly will be the winner.</prosody></speak>
